function NPC_101020:Init( NPCID ) --[[ User Data 1: Pain --]]
NPC_ReserveUserData(NPCID, 5);
NPC_101020.NpcIdSkillDummy = 101011 NPC_101020.NpcIdWaterJail = 101012 NPC_101020.NpcIdWaterJailHard = 101013
NPC_101020.TalIdSmallCircleOfIce = 210101100 NPC_101020.TalIdLargeCircleOfIce = 210101101
NPC_101020.BufIdWaterBall = 41302 -- 꾸미기용 버프 NPC_101020.BufIdIcyRegen = 41304 -- 41304 #생명력회복
NPC_101020.IntervalWaterJail = 10 NPC_101020.TimerIdWaterJail = 1 NPC_101020.TalIdFinishWaterJail = 210101022 NPC_101020.TalIdFinishWaterJail2 = 210101022 end
function NPC_101020:OnSpawn( SpawnInfo ) SpawnInfo.NPC:GainBuff( NPC_101020.BufIdWaterBall ) end
function NPC_101020:OnActSmallCircleOfIce( ThisActor, Enemy ) local SkillDummy = NPC_101020:SummonCircleOfIce( ThisActor, Enemy )
if not SkillDummy:IsNull() then SkillDummy:UseTalentSelf( NPC_101020.TalIdSmallCircleOfIce ) SkillDummy:Despawn(false) end end
function NPC_101020:OnActLargeCircleOfIce( ThisActor, Enemy ) local SkillDummy = NPC_101020:SummonCircleOfIce( ThisActor, Enemy )
if not SkillDummy:IsNull() then SkillDummy:UseTalentSelf( NPC_101020.TalIdLargeCircleOfIce ) SkillDummy:Despawn(false) end end
function NPC_101020:SummonCircleOfIce( ThisActor, Enemy ) --GLog( "NPC_101020:SummonCircleOfIce\n" )
local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor )
local SummonPos = vec3() local LocalAdjPos = vec3()
LocalAdjPos = vec3(math.random(0, 0), math.random(0, 0), 0) SummonPos = Math_LocalToWorld( Enemy:GetDir(), Enemy:GetPos(), LocalAdjPos ) local SkillDummy = ThisNPC:SummonNow( NPC_101020.NpcIdSkillDummy, SummonPos ) return SkillDummy end
function NPC_101020:SummonWaterJail( ThisNPC, Enemy, NPCID ) --GLog( "NPC_101020:SummonCircleOfIce\n" )
local SummonPos = vec3() local LocalAdjPos = vec3()
LocalAdjPos = vec3(math.random(0, 0), math.random(0, 0), 0) SummonPos = Math_LocalToWorld( Enemy:GetDir(), Enemy:GetPos(), LocalAdjPos ) local WaterJail = ThisNPC:SummonNow( NPCID, SummonPos ) return WaterJail end
function NPC_101020:OnTimer( TimerID ) if TimerID == NPC_101020.TimerIdWaterJail then if this:GetMode() == 1 then this:ClearJob() this:UseTalentSelf( NPC_101020.TalIdFinishWaterJail ) this:UseTalentSelf( 210101024 ) end end end
function NPC_101020:OnStartStartWaterJailHard( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor )
local WaterJail = NPC_101020:SummonWaterJail( ThisNPC, Enemy, NPC_101020.NpcIdWaterJailHard )
if not WaterJail:IsNull() then WaterJail:FaceTo( ThisNPC ) WaterJail:SetTarget( Enemy ) ThisNPC:SetTarget( WaterJail ) ThisNPC:SetTimer( NPC_101020.TimerIdWaterJail, NPC_101020.IntervalWaterJail, false ) end end
function NPC_101020:OnStartStartWaterJail( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor )
local WaterJail = NPC_101020:SummonWaterJail( ThisNPC, Enemy, NPC_101020.NpcIdWaterJail )
if not WaterJail:IsNull() then WaterJail:FaceTo( ThisNPC ) WaterJail:SetTarget( Enemy ) ThisNPC:SetTarget( WaterJail ) ThisNPC:SetTimer( NPC_101020.TimerIdWaterJail, NPC_101020.IntervalWaterJail, false ) end end
function NPC_101020:OnStartFinishWaterJail( ThisActor, Enemy ) --GLog( "NPC_101020:OnStartFinishWaterJail\n" ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor )
if ThisNPC:GetSummonCount() > 0 then local WaterJail = AsNPC( ThisNPC:GetTarget() ) WaterJail:Die( WaterJail ) WaterJail:Despawn(false) elseif Enemy:IsDead() then ThisNPC:RemoveBuff( NPC_101020.BufIdIcyRegen ) end end
function NPC_101020:OnFinishAndAggroFar( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor ) ThisNPC:Aggro( "far", 0 ) end
